body_html:
I'm guessing you mean making functions part of the TF_Graph and add functions for manipulating them? Yes, that sounds reasonable, just not something we've gotten around to yet and hence contributions welcome :)

(BTW, just want to make sure you're aware of the TensorFlow Java API which may be useful for Scala as well)
body_text:
I'm guessing you mean making functions part of the TF_Graph and add functions for manipulating them? Yes, that sounds reasonable, just not something we've gotten around to yet and hence contributions welcome :)
(BTW, just want to make sure you're aware of the TensorFlow Java API which may be useful for Scala as well)
body:
I'm guessing you mean making functions part of the `TF_Graph` and add functions for manipulating them? Yes, that sounds reasonable, just not something we've gotten around to yet and hence contributions welcome :)

(BTW, just want to make sure you're aware of the [TensorFlow Java API](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/java/reference/org/tensorflow/package-summary) which may be useful for Scala as well)
